alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 08 at 2:06PM CDT until October 09 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Koochiching, North Itasca and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band and the Bois Forte Band, Nett Lake and, Deer Creek areas. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas near Lake Superior will be warmer. There are also concerns about cloud cover tonight which would impact temperatures. We currently expect some clearing, if clouds remain more widespread then warmer temperatures would occur.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca
